ing: 2 (15 ounce) cans black beans, rinsed and drained
3 serrano chile peppers, seeded and chopped
1 red bell pepper, seeded and chopped
des: "Cold black bean salad with a bite!  It makes a great side dish for any Mexican or Southwestern dish. This recipe has become a healthy favorite in our family. Adjust the amount of serrano pepper to suit your spice tolerance."
ins: In a medium serving bowl, mix together the black beans, tomatoes, chilies, bell pepper, vinegar, oil and salt. Chill for 1 hour before serving.
